s:Ge/BeamPosition/Type="Group"

# I'm not sure what the beam specifications should be

s:So/XRayBeam/BeamParticle = "gamma"
d:So/XRayBeam/BeamEnergy = 120 keV
u:So/XRayBeam/BeamEnergySpread = 0 # I don't know what this should be

d:So/XRayBeam/BeamAngularSpreadY = 0.0 rad
